market_rules.SectorRotation: If IT is weak, look at Banking or Pharma for stability.
market_rules.ExpiryDay: High Gamma volatility usually occurs after 1:30 PM.
market_rules.NiftyMovers: Reliance and HDFC Bank combined can move Nifty 50+ points alone.
market_rules.GlobalImpact: US Nasdaq highly impacts NIFTY IT sector sentiment.
market_rules.PreMarketImpact: GIFT Nifty movements often dictate the opening gap for Nifty 50.
market_rules.MidCapBehavior: Midcaps usually follow Nifty trend but with higher beta/volatility.
market_rules.VIXRelation: India VIX > 20 indicates high fear and potential for sharp pullbacks.
market_rules.FII_DII_Activity: FII buying usually leads to heavy-weight stock rallies.

impact_behavior.behavior: High IV, wide swings, usually ranges 2-4%.
Direct impact on Bank Nifty and Banking stocks.
Individual stock volatility increases 2-3 days before results.
Impacts USDINR and IT stocks globally.

stock_behaviors.RELIANCE: Often used to hold Nifty when other sectors are falling.
stock_behaviors.HDFCBANK: Key driver for Bank Nifty; 1% move here is significant.
stock_behaviors.INFY: Sensitive to US economic data and Nasdaq performance.
stock_behaviors.ITC: Considered a defensive stock; often rises when market is uncertain.
stock_behaviors.TATAMOTORS: High volatility, sensitive to global JLR sales and auto policy.
